deg2rad
===

> Convert an angle from degrees to radians.


<!-- <usage> -->

## Usage

``` javascript
var deg2rad = require( '@stdlib/math/base/special/deg2rad' );
```

#### deg2rad( x )

Converts an angle from degrees to radians.

``` javascript
var r = deg2rad( 90.0 );
// returns ~1.571

r = deg2rad( -45.0 );
// returns ~-0.785

r = deg2rad( NaN );
// returns NaN
```

<!-- </usage> -->


<!-- <examples> -->

## Examples

``` javascript
var randu = require( '@stdlib/math/base/random/randu' );
var deg2rad = require( '@stdlib/math/base/special/deg2rad' );

var d;
var r;
var i;

for ( i = 0; i < 100; i++ ) {
    d = randu()*720.0 - 360.0;
    r = deg2rad( d );
    console.log( 'degrees: %d => radians: %d', d, r );
}
```

<!-- </examples> -->
